alert.note: Alert for Osage; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 6:00PM CDT until May 04 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Central Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Keystone State Park, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Sand Springs... Owasso... Skiatook... Mannford... Sperry... Keystone State Park... Turley... Gray... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
